_sText:
de_nighthawk_pro by Sk3tch 
-former www.cevo.com map submission-

Mission Statement:
Protect the Stealth Nighthawk at all cost!

-Terrorists: Destroy the F117 Nighthawk jet or it's missile supply.

-Counter-Terrorists: Prevent the Terrorists from bombing the targets.

Notes: There are 2 bomb targets.

- Special Thanks to BYFBO clan for the beta testing!
- REDFOX: Player-clipping and overview.
- Ill_Kid, Rick_D, and PhilipK: Models.
- Chizbone: NAV file. 

Map edited 14AUGUST2010. Contact Sk3tch at www.sk3maps.com.

***NOTE*** THE NAV FILE IS PENDING FROM Chizbone

This map has been edited from the original due to the CS:S june23, 2010 update making the former "de_cevo_nighthawk"unplayable due to texture issues.
The following has been fixed or added to the map:

-Made the environment daytime.
-Removed unnecessary props that got into players paths.
-optimized the map more with 10 fps gain in general.
-made ramp on bombsite with jet longer and easier to access for future bot use.
-fixed random errors.
-removed the battle noises as it seemed to "lag" lower end users.
-changed the ground dirt to sand. (easier to see players).
-cleared props in narrow hallway near jet hangar.
-Adjusted player spawns for more even gameplay.
-Adjusted prop fade.
-All files except NAV included in the BSP file.

Any issues please contact me!
